title: Drawing, Page of a drawing book; Crocodiles hunted by Tentyritae, ca. 1590
title_raw: Page of a drawing book; Crocodiles hunted by Tentyritae
medium: charcoal, pen, ink, bistre wash on paper
inscribed: Gli huomini Tentiriti nel nilo salgano a chavallo su coccodrilli / e messa lor una mazza in bocca gli guidano pigliandola / per la ponta come con la triglia e cosi gli fanno prigionieri del bastone. Plinio L° 8 cap. 25 / Li coccodrilli vanno nuotare nellaqua con lamo da sopra gridano in testa / li ve del huomine che la ma[r?]zzano.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. Five men are seated astride crocodiles. Two of the beasts are in the Nile and three of them at the bank on the left. One of the latter is being killed by blows upon the head with a stick which originally was held by the man in the mouth of the beast, as shown in the other cases. Two more heads of crocodiles emerge from the water. One spectator stands at left under a tree. More people are shown at the other bank. Recto: "Gli huomini Tentiriti nel nilo salgano a chavallo su coccodrilli / e messa lor una mazza in bocca gli guidano pigliandola / per la ponta come con la triglia e cosi gli fanno prigionieri del bastone. Plinio L° 8 cap. 25 / Li coccodrilli vanno nuotare nellaqua con lamo da sopra gridano in testa / li ve del huomine che la ma[r?]zzano.

participants.person_name: Jan van der Straet, called Stradanus

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Page of a drawing book; Crocodiles hunted by Tentyritae, ca. 1590. charcoal, pen, ink, bistre wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2501.
